text:
Wildlife Advisory Committee Revocation Order 2000

I make the following order under section 12(1) of the National Parks and Wildlife Act 1970 .

6 June 2000

D. E. LLEWELLYN

Minister for Primary Industries, Water and Environment

1. Short title
    This order may be cited as the Wildlife Advisory Committee Revocation Order 2000 .

2. Commencement
    This order takes effect on the day on which its making is notified in the Gazette.

3. Revocation
    On the day on which this order takes effect â€“
            (a) the National Parks and Wildlife Order 1972 (S.R. 1972, No. 292) is revoked; and
            (b) the Wildlife Advisory Committee established under that order is dissolved.

Displayed and numbered in accordance with the Rules Publication Act 1953.

Notified in the Gazette on 14 June 2000

This order is administered in the Department of Primary Industries, Water and Environment.
